TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableList.name: DEVELOPMENTAL_MILESTONE_CATEGORIES
TunableList.description: A mapping of developmental milestone categories enums to corresponding display data.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed next to this category in the UI.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of this Developmental Milestone.

Tunable.name: sim_info_panel_default_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are new Milestones displayed in this category.

Tunable.name: sim_info_panel_over_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are new Milestones displayed in this category and the mouse is over the button.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: Hovertip text to show in the UI.

TunableList.name: DEVELOPMENTAL_MILESTONE_UNLOCK_OVERRIDES
TunableList.description: A mapping between milestone and its data class. Useful if any event sequencing behavior needs to be specialized. Discuss with a GPE before tuning.

TunableList.name: LIFETIME_MILESTONE_PANEL_FILTERS
TunableList.description: Terms used to filter milestone categories shown in the Lifetime Milestone Panel.

TunableList.name: ages
TunableList.description: The ages used as filter terms for the filter button.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon of the filter button.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of the filter term for display in the UI. Example: 'Children and Teens'

TunableList.name: RETROACTIVE_MILESTONES
TunableList.description: A list of loots to apply to the sim. The loot list will be applied to the Sim when: 1) the Sim is first initialized and the EP13 content is available. 2) EP13 is reinstalled 3) LOD update occurs

Tunable.description: Loot applied to the sim to grant initial milestones.

TunableList.name: VIEW_MILESTONES_LOOT
TunableList.description: A list of loots to apply to the active sim when the view milestones command is run from the UI.

Tunable.description: Loot applied to the active sim.
